attributes.action: de-recognise the statehood of Vatican City
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Vatican City is recognised by the UK government as a sovereign state and the Catholic Church therefore enjoys an undeservedly privileged position with respect to other organizations, both religious and secular.

We believe that this is a historical anomaly, and should be corrected by officially de-recognising the state of Vatican City.
